pageContext.claim: “We've ended the war on beautiful, clean coal. We've stopped the EPA intrusion. American coal exports are already up. Think of this. Think of this. American exports of coal are already up more than 60 percent this year.”
pageContext.analysis: Thermal coal exports are up, but not because of Trump administration policies. This is believed to be a temporary blip due to a rise in coal prices. The Energy Information Administration predicts experts will moderate and ultimately rise about 20 percent year over year.
